hero.title: Hi, I'm Esteban Sayago
hero.about: Fullstack Developer. Passionate about creating amazing digital products.

experiencia.title: Backend Developer
experiencia.description: Developing REST APIs with NestJS, integrating OpenAI's artificial intelligence models, and implementing text and audio generation features using AI. Successfully launched TalkIAmos, exceeding expectations and positioning itself as a scalable and compelling project at a Demo Day with corporate partners.

experiencia.title: Backend Developer
experiencia.description: Development of RESTful APIs, creation of models and schemas in MongoDB, suggesting code improvements and optimizations, resolving integration issues. Additionally, I contributed to the frontend, where I integrated with the backend and directly enhanced software delivery.

experiencia.title: FullStack Developer
experiencia.description: From simple web development using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. To Full Stack application development with React, Express and NoSQL databases. During all this time I have learned to apply best coding practices, develop strong problem solving skills and search for solutions.

proyectos.title: Movies App
proyectos.subtitle: January 2023
proyectos.description: Movie site that allows you to search, browse summaries, discover the main actors and watch trailers everything you need to find your next favorite movie in one place!

proyectos.title: Weather App
proyectos.subtitle: September 2023
proyectos.description: Application to check the current weather, get forecasts for the next few days, as well as additional details such as humidity, pressure, wind speed, UV index and probability of rain.

proyectos.title: Grocery Food
proyectos.subtitle: October 2023
proyectos.description: I transformed a design made in Figma into a food delivery restaurant website.

proyectos.title: Markdown Previewer
proyectos.subtitle: December 2023
proyectos.description: Project for freeCodeCamp Front End Libraries certification. Using React and the marked library to render Markdown.

proyectos.title: Encryptor
proyectos.subtitle: April 2023
proyectos.description: One of the challenges of Oracle's ONE program, a simple encryptor using JavaScript to improve our programming logic.
